scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:app
scripts.build:pkg: tsc -p tsconfig.pkg.json && npx tsc-alias -p tsconfig.pkg.json && node scripts/copy-css.js
scripts.toscratch: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const paths=['.next','.turbo','node_modules','dist','build','coverage','android','ios','www','capacitor-out'];for(const p of paths){try{fs.rmSync(p,{recursive:true,force:true});console.log('removed',p);}catch(e){}}" && npm run functions:clean
scripts.rebuild: npm run build && npm run postbuild && npm run functions:build && npm run build:pkg
scripts.github: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$msg=$env:npm_config_msg; if ([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($msg)) { $msg='General Adjustments' }; git status; git add -A; git diff --cached --quiet; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { git commit -m \"$msg\" }; git fetch origin; git switch main; git pull --rebase origin main; git push origin main"
scripts.mirrors: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "if (Test-Path repo-mirror) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force repo-mirror }; git clone --mirror https://github.com/nixinxcom/NIXINX.git repo-mirror; Set-Location repo-mirror; git remote add node-htleamington https://github.com/nixinxcom/NODE-HTLeamington.git; git push node-htleamington --mirror; Set-Location ..; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force repo-mirror; git clone --mirror https://github.com/nixinxcom/NIXINX.git repo-mirror; Set-Location repo-mirror; git remote add node-htwindsor https://github.com/nixinxcom/NODE-HTWindsor.git; git push node-htwindsor --mirror; Set-Location ..; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force repo-mirror; git clone --mirror https://github.com/nixinxcom/NIXINX.git repo-mirror; Set-Location repo-mirror; git remote add node-elpatron https://github.com/nixinxcom/NODE-ElPatron.git; git push node-elpatron --mirror"
scripts.deploy:all: npm run github && npm run trigger:all
scripts.trigger: powershell -NoProfile -Command "try { curl.exe -X POST 'https://api.vercel.com/v1/integrations/deploy/prj_gakG67qzmYqXfNIFBPpPDTaDeYaI/JaUs2x8Dt8' > $null; Write-Host 'Triggered NIXINX OK'; } catch { Write-Host 'Failed NIXINX'; exit 1 }"
scripts.trigger:nixinx: powershell -NoProfile -Command "try { curl.exe -X POST 'https://api.vercel.com/v1/integrations/deploy/prj_5WhvzM7roFJ9Q1S74hwNtLg5Rmxr/VArZoblR9c' > $null; Write-Host 'Triggered NIXINX OK'; } catch { Write-Host 'Failed NIXINX'; exit 1 }"

scripts.trigger:htwindsor: powershell -NoProfile -Command "try { curl.exe -X POST 'https://api.vercel.com/v1/integrations/deploy/prj_Ni0gWvmVA1AMXy7QOIWq5tjZQvv2/Y0gZgw6k9t' > $null; Write-Host 'Triggered HTWindsor OK'; } catch { Write-Host 'Failed HTWindsor'; exit 1 }"
scripts.trigger:htleamington: powershell -NoProfile -Command "try { curl.exe -X POST 'https://api.vercel.com/v1/integrations/deploy/prj_cizfjdHBX60kMBbqYg6CQTpoxXm3/Ubwftb8ac3' > $null; Write-Host 'Triggered HTLeamington OK'; } catch { Write-Host 'Failed HTLeamington'; exit 1 }"
scripts.trigger:all: npm run trigger  && npm run trigger:elpatron && npm run trigger:htwindsor && npm run trigger:htleamington && npm run trigger:nixinx
scripts.env: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const e=process.env.npm_config_env; if(!e){console.error('Falta parametro --env=<Name> (ej: --env=NIXINX)');process.exit(1);} const s='.env.'+e+'.local'; const d='.env.local'; if(!fs.existsSync(s)){console.error('No existe '+s);process.exit(1);} fs.copyFileSync(s,d); console.log('Using '+s+' -> '+d);"
scripts.functions:clean: cd functionalities/functions && node -e "const fs=require('fs');for(const p of ['node_modules','lib']){try{fs.rmSync(p,{recursive:true,force:true});console.log('removed',p);}catch(e){}}"
scripts.functions:deploy:NIXINX:full: npm run functions:build && npm run functions:deploy:NIXINX
scripts.functions:deploy:ElPatron:full: npm run functions:build && npm run functions:deploy:ElPatron
scripts.functions:deploy:HTWindsor:full: npm run functions:build && npm run functions:deploy:HTWindsor
scripts.functions:deploy:HTLeamington:full: npm run functions:build && npm run functions:deploy:HTLeamington
scripts.functions:deploy:all: npm run functions:build && npm run functions:deploy:NIXINX && npm run functions:deploy:ElPatron && npm run functions:deploy:HTWindsor && npm run functions:deploy:HTLeamington
